Citing pysan

If you use pysan in an academic publication, citing the software as follows would be greatly appreciated:

pysan: Sequence Analysis in Python, Scholten, 2020

APA Style

Scholten, O.J. (2020). pysan: Sequence Analysis in Python. https://pysan.org

Bibtex Entry

@article{pysan,
     title={pysan: Sequence Analysis in Python},
     author={Scholten, O. J.},
     journal={Available Online},
     year={2020},
     url={https://pysan.org}
}
